iZec | Copilot: AI-Powered Knowledge Assistant

Short Description:
An intelligent assistant that provides instant information from your knowledge base by copying text or typing. Get accurate responses powered by vector embeddings technology.

Detailed Description:
iZec is an AI-powered knowledge assistant for sales and customer representatives. It uses advanced vector embeddings technology to search through your pre-existing knowledge base and provide accurate responses. During your conversations, you can get instant information by either copying any text or asking questions directly to the assistant. All responses are generated from your stored knowledge base, ensuring consistent and accurate information.

Features:
- Text Copy and Type: Copy text or type questions and get immediate responses
- Vector Search: Utilizes vector embeddings to find the most relevant information from your knowledge base
- Smart Assistant: Get comprehensive and accurate answers based on your stored documentation
- Minimalist Interface: Sleek and user-friendly design that doesn't interfere with your chat experience
- Chat History: Access your previous queries and responses stored securely in Chrome's local storage
- Quick Reply: Send messages instantly with the Enter key
- Minimizable: Can be minimized when not needed

Use Cases:
- Quick access to company knowledge during meetings
- Consistent information retrieval from documented sources
- Information verification during conversations
- Technical support assistance using approved documentation
- Research queries within your knowledge base

Privacy and Security:
- No chat data is stored
- Only selected or typed text is processed
- Your personal data is protected
- No access to any information is requested
- Responses are generated only from your pre-approved knowledge base
